\documentclass[tikz,crop]{standalone}
\usepackage{fontspec}
\setmainfont{Fira Code}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1.5]
\node[thick,draw] (0) at (0,0) {hello world};
\node[thick,draw] (1) at (3, 1.5) {\textbf{a }hello world};
\node[thick,draw] (2) at (3, 0.5) {hello w\textbf{yy}rld\textbf{!!}};
\node[thick,draw] (3) at (3,-0.5) {hello w\textbf{yy}rld};
\node[thick,draw] (4) at (3,-1.5) {h\textbf{xx}llo world};
\node[thick,draw] (5) at (6, 0) {a hxxllo wyyrld!!};

\path[->,draw,thick] (0) edge [bend left=20]  (1);
\path[->,draw,thick] (0) edge [bend left=15]  (2);
\path[->,draw,thick] (0) edge [bend left=-15] (3);
\path[->,draw,thick] (0) edge [bend left=-20] (4);

\path[-,draw,thick,dashed] (1) edge [bend left=20]  (5);
\path[-,draw,thick,dashed] (2) edge [bend left=15]  (5);
\path[-,draw,thick,dashed] (3) edge [bend left=-15] (5);
\path[-,draw,thick,dashed] (4) edge [bend left=-20] (5);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
